Finalize a bson_buffer object.

Parameters:
b the bson_buffer object to finalize.
Returns:
the raw data. to deallocate memory, either free this or call bson_buffer_destroy, but not both (see below).

void bson_fatal ( int  ok  ) 

Exit fatally.

Parameters:
ok exits if ok is equal to 0.
void bson_fatal_msg ( int  ok,
const char *  msg 
)

Exit fatally with an error message.

Parameters:
ok exits if ok is equal to 0.
msg prints to stderr before exiting.

Returns:
